justification: Recognizes B’s urgency but ignores B’s preference for reliable workhorse RBs and established talent. Trading Sam Lewis (stable Tier 2 RB) weakens B’s thin RB room, while Moore (Tier 3, declining role) and Wright (Tier 5 deep threat) don’t fit B’s consistency bias and WR depth. The rationale is generic and overstates value (“two solid starters”), with little two-sided reasoning. Feasible but poorly aligned with B’s beliefs and needs.
